article_title: Cruz supporters boo Trump at conservative gathering
article_text:
Cruz supporters boo Trump at conservative gathering

Photo: Willis Glassgow, FRE ﻿Donald Trump got boos from some supporters of Sen. Ted Cruz...

MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. - Donald Trump ran afoul of some conservative activists Saturday with an attack on Republican presidential rival Ted Cruz for his failure to disclose certain bank loans during his 2012 Senate bid.

article_metadata.description: MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. - Donald Trump ran afoul of some conservative activists Saturday with an attack on Republican presidential rival Ted Cruz for his failure to disclose certain bank loans during his 2012 Senate bid.  Cruz instead urged voters to examine candidates' records on a range of issues dear to conservatives, among them repealing the Affordable Care Act, fighting abortion and same-sex marriage, and opposing bank bailouts like the one Congress adopted in 2008.
article_metadata.author.name: By Bill Barrow, ASSOCIATED PRESS
